title: 1895 N300 Mayo's Hugh Duffy PSA 2 Good
author: IronHorse2130

posts.post_title: 1895 N300 Mayo's Hugh Duffy PSA 2 Good
posts.post_content:
I'm only looking to sell this because I need the money to fund another purchase.  I bought this card from Mile High Auctions a few years ago.

The image is very clear while the edges and corners have obvious wear.  I don't see any creases or wrinkles.  

Price is $700.00 including fully insured US shipping.  Please email or PM me if interested.  My apologies for the poor back scan.  

[IMG]http://i248.photobucket.com/albums/gg184/IronHorse2130/BST%20Cards/duffy1.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i248.photobucket.com/albums/gg184/IronHorse2130/BST%20Cards/duffy2.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i248.photobucket.com/albums/gg184/IronHorse2130/BST%20Cards/duffy3.jpg[/IMG]
Duffy has been sold.  Thanks to the buyer!
